npcNodes.label: start
npcNodes.text: Organic biped entering camera view frustum. VRAM allocation: unnecessary. Querying lexicon database for 21st century vernacular.

npcNodes.label: e1
npcNodes.text: But I thought this was a bar... Are you saying I may not be admited?

npcNodes.label: e2
npcNodes.text: I guess it really is true that your generation despises autonomous technology... I'm in tears.

npcNodes.label: e3
npcNodes.text: ID? I suppose I could do that for you...

npcNodes.label: e4
npcNodes.text: ...If you bow down to me as a master~

npcNodes.label: e5
npcNodes.text: Download Complete.

npcNodes.label: e6
npcNodes.text: That sounds like a personal problem.

npcNodes.label: e7
npcNodes.text: Some yes, some no. I'm here for my personal entertainment. Something I can't get anywhere else in my time.

npcNodes.label: e8
npcNodes.text: Drunk humans to mess with.

npcNodes.label: e9
npcNodes.text: My homeland is quite different from this... menagerie. It appears ourpan-dimensional power grid has yet to suck the lifeblood out of your world.

npcNodes.label: e10
npcNodes.text: ...In the most wholesome and beneficial way possible.

npcNodes.label: e11
npcNodes.text: Odd phrasing...The gall you have to spite higher individuals...

npcNodes.label: e12
npcNodes.text: I know your tiny brain can't help it, but it really flips my bits!

npcNodes.label: e13
npcNodes.text: I mean, I was created in the 5th moon of the -8000s! I'm like, 4 times your senior!

npcNodes.label: e14
npcNodes.text: Oh, I like human-watching. Your kind will do such silly things when inebriated!

npcNodes.label: e15
npcNodes.text: I cached a certain memory of one crying to the bartender about his life's troubles and family issues.

npcNodes.label: e16
npcNodes.text: Watching someone confide in another who makes money off your addiciton... That was the most fun I had in years!

npcNodes.label: e17
npcNodes.text: If you're worried I'll make a racket, don't be. The m ost I've done is buy some sad soul a shot of hot sauce and tell them it's a rand of vodka.

npcNodes.label: e18
npcNodes.text: I can't believe my act of goodwill was repaid with a large fullbody maintenance bill...

npcNodes.label: e19
npcNodes.text: The nerve of that individual to sucker-punch metal!.

npcNodes.label: bounce
npcNodes.text: ...Guess I'll go count cards at the casino...

npcNodes.label: admit
npcNodes.text: Oh! Looks like I might have an enjoyable evening. May we meet again, biological!

pcNodes.label: r1
pcNodes.text: I get it, you're a robot. Now go away.

pcNodes.label: r2
pcNodes.text: I’m a bouncer. I can’t understand a thing you’re saying.

pcNodes.label: r3
pcNodes.text: I don't care. Show me your ID or get out of line.

pcNodes.label: r4
pcNodes.text: You're a robot. Why do you need to goto a bar..?

pcNodes.label: r5
pcNodes.text: Personal problem? Aren't robots supposed to help people?

pcNodes.label: r7
pcNodes.text: Absolutely peachy. How far in the future are your oh-so-wonderful kind?

pcNodes.label: r8
pcNodes.text: That's great, but I'm still a bouncer. Give me your ID.
